channel.title: Shops

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:4, topic:354991”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=451561.msg3309637#msg3309637 date=1281894747]

[quote author=usman555 link=topic=451561.msg3309627#msg3309627 date=1281894385]
Hi guys, im trying to add a shop that costs “AxeKilled” Points but I always get “Not enough coins for this item”
here is my code:

if (MyShopID == 52) { if (AxeKilled >= TotPrice2) { if (freeSlots() > 0) { AxeKilled -= TotPrice2; addItem(itemID, 1); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); break; } else { sM("Not enough Axes Killed for this item."); } }
[/quote]Fix’t…
[/quote]Thanks but that gave me 100 errors[/quote]onvm, i thought it didnt work cause of errors; go with your original

Read full topic

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Hi guys, im trying to add a shop that costs “AxeKilled” Points but I always get “Not enough coins for this item”
here is my code:

if (MyShopID == 52) { if (AxeKilled >= TotPrice2) { if (freeSlots() > 0) { AxeKilled -= TotPrice2; addItem(itemID, 1); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { sM("Not enough Axes Killed for this item."); } }
